IX.ii.1.D.5.a
.
Temporary Suspension of Payments by VA
VA may temporarily suspend payments, pending a final determination by SSA, on receipt of any of the following notices:
death of a beneficiary
marriage of a child beneficiary
marriage of a surviving spouse, or
a surviving spouse under age 60 who does not have in their custody at least one child that is
under age 18, or
over age 18 and incapable of self-support.
Note
:  When payments to a surviving spouse are being terminated because a child under age 18 or child incapable of self-support is no longer in custody, include in the letter to the payee notice of potential entitlement at age 60 upon the filing of a new application.
